name: Slimescape (Aenin, Fake_Fireball, Willowian, danismanmeltem, SafaMarley)
description:
Slimescape (Aenin, Fake_Fireball, Willowian, danismanmeltem, SafaMarley) is an action-platformer game developed by Aenin, Fake_Fireball, SafaMarley and Willowian. It was originally released in 2021.
Slimescape (Aenin, Fake_Fireball, Willowian, danismanmeltem, SafaMarley) is available on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
